name: St. Maria Goretti

locations.description: Martyred in Nettuno, Italy, for defending her chastity

summary: Maria Goretti was an Italian girl who was murdered at the age of 11 for refusing to submit to a sexual assault. She forgave her attacker before dying and is venerated as a martyr and patron saint of purity, rape victims, and young people. She is the youngest canonized saint in the Catholic Church.
